subtitle: These tasty kebabs are really simple to make, and they are perfect as appetisers, served with a selection of dips, when entertaining.

method.text: Roll up the salami strips. Thread each one onto a skewer with a cube of chicken.
Toss the avocado in the lemon juice. Drain and thread onto the skewers.
Sprinkle with black pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken and avocado dippers
